title: Will Permanent Suspensions EVER Be Lifted In The Future?
body:
Now before you white knights start coming in here and typing angrily  at your key boards saying "WELL IF YOU GOT REPORTED THERE IS NOOOOO WAY YOU CAN EVER BE UN-BANNED YOU TOXIC DISGUST" just here me out. I just have a question for 'Riot Games', that question is will PERMANENTLY BANNED accounts ever get the chance to be Un-banned in the future, at all. Will there be a time in the future at all, I don't know when but in the future for perma banned accounts to redeem there selves and get their accounts back?

I was banned and I am a toxic asshole but after this ban I see that and I want to become a better person and really want to change. So I was wondering if this could ever happen say like a year down the line even two?

I spent a lot of time on that account, (about 2 years) and I would wait forever long and change my attitude completely to get it back however long it will take me and really redeem myself as a human being 

Thanks for your time 

-Your everyday toxic asshole xRohue :D   {{champion:107}}
